name: INDeleteTasksIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants that indicate the response state.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: A response code that indicates an unknown state.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: A response code that indicates app readiness.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: A response code that indicates deletion is still in progress.

items.name: case success
items.desc: A response code that indicates your app succeeded.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: A response code that indicates you were unable to delete the task.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: A response code that indicates the user must launch your app to delete the tasks.
